org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support
类 AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler

java.lang.Object
  org.jasig.cas.authentication.AbstractAuthenticationHandler
      org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support.AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler
          org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.support.AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler
所有已实现的接口：
AuthenticationHandler
直接已知子类：
AcceptUsersAuthenticationHandler, FileAuthenticationHandler, JaasAuthenticationHandler, RejectUsersAuthenticationHandler
public abstract class AbstractUsernamePasswordAuthenticationHandler
extends AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler

Abstract class to override supports so that we don't need to duplicate the check for UsernamePasswordCredential.

从以下版本开始：
3.0
作者：
Scott Battaglia, Marvin S. Addison

方法详细信息

doAuthentication

protected final HandlerResult doAuthentication(Credential credential)
                                        throws GeneralSecurityException,
                                               PreventedException
Performs the details of authentication and returns an authentication handler result on success.

指定者：
类 AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler 中的 doAuthentication
参数：
credential - Credential to authenticate.
返回：
Authentication handler result on success.
抛出：
GeneralSecurityException - On authentication failure that is thrown out to the caller of AbstractPreAndPostProcessingAuthenticationHandler.authenticate(org.jasig.cas.authentication.Credential).
PreventedException - On the indeterminate case when authentication is prevented.

authenticateUsernamePasswordInternal

protected abstract Principal authenticateUsernamePasswordInternal(String username,
                                                                  String password)
                                                           throws GeneralSecurityException,
                                                                  PreventedException
Authenticates a username/password credential by an arbitrary strategy.

参数：
username - Non-null username produced by principalNameTransformer acting on UsernamePasswordCredential.getUsername().
password - Password to authenticate.
返回：
Principal resolved from credential on authentication success or null if no principal could be resolved from the credential.
抛出：
GeneralSecurityException - On authentication failure.
PreventedException - On the indeterminate case when authentication is prevented.

getPasswordEncoder

protected final PasswordEncoder getPasswordEncoder()
Method to return the PasswordEncoder to be used to encode passwords.

返回：
the PasswordEncoder associated with this class.

getPrincipalNameTransformer

protected final PrincipalNameTransformer getPrincipalNameTransformer()

setPasswordEncoder

public final void setPasswordEncoder(PasswordEncoder passwordEncoder)
Sets the PasswordEncoder to be used with this class.

参数：
passwordEncoder - the PasswordEncoder to use when encoding passwords.

setPrincipalNameTransformer

public final void setPrincipalNameTransformer(PrincipalNameTransformer principalNameTransformer)

supports

public boolean supports(Credential credential)
从接口 AuthenticationHandler 复制的描述
Determines whether the handler has the capability to authenticate the given credential. In practical terms, the AuthenticationHandler.authenticate(Credential) method MUST be capable of processing a given credential if supports returns true on the same credential.

参数：
credential - The credential to check.
返回：
True if credential is a UsernamePasswordCredential, false otherwise.
